Method Detail

disconnect

public void disconnect()
This method removes this client from the server's list, stops communication etc. Simply, it does exactly what its name indicates.

log

public void log(java.lang.String s)
The direction of output of different kinds of clients may differ, but all of them must implement a log. Implementation may look like "System.out.println(s);" but it must be done.

Parameters:
s -

Listens for messages from the other side.

the message from the other side
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if timeout was reached before any communication occurred.
